Title: Diego Saves Mommy and Baby Sloth
Plot: Diego and a sloth, Sammy, try to save a mother sloth and her baby before a mudslide hits their tree.  On the way they face several challenges.  They must row across a rocky lake, tiptoe quietly around birds, and find the right path to go down.  They also have to find an animal that can help them climb a rocky mountain.
Writer: Ligiah Villalobos, Chris Gifford, Valerie Walsh
